scripts.dev: npm run prisma:setup && tsc && npm run test:coverage && node dist/server.js
scripts.start: npm run prisma:setup && tsc && npm run test && node dist/server.js
scripts.prisma:setup: npx prisma db push && npx prisma generate
scripts.start:dev: rm -rf dist && npm run prisma:setup && tsc -p tsconfig.json && pm2 kill && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env dev
scripts.start:test: rm -rf dist logs wwebjs_auth && npm run prisma:setup && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run test && pm2 kill && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env test
scripts.start:prod: rm -rf dist && npm run prisma:setup && tsc -p tsconfig.json && pm2 kill && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
